## Properties

| Property       | Attribute      | Description                                  | Type                            | Default     |
| -------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignContent` | `aligncontent` | alignment of the children elements           | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"` | `'center'`  |
| `href`         | `href`         | href for anchor tag                          | `string`                        | `undefined` |
| `isActive`     | `isactive`     | indicates if the label is active or inactive | `boolean`                       | `false`     |
| `isDisabled`   | `isdisabled`   | indicates the disabled status                | `boolean`                       | `false`     |
| `target`       | `target`       | target for anchor tag                        | `string`                        | `undefined` |
